document.full_text: 'sister act,' based on the hit movie, offers tunes that echo the philadelphia sound and a stage full of nuns flaring their gams like the rockettes.
document.title: theater review | 'sister act': different church, more sequins
lines_and_colors: 'sister act,' based on the hit movie, offers tunes that echo the philadelphia sound and a stage full of nuns flaring their gams like the rockettes.
